title: back rest part for forward facing bench seat for sale

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
It's the bit of wood that makes up the back rest for the forward facing bench seat that attaches to the rear bulk head. It is NOT the type that has a couple of small cupboards in it.
Contact onion on here.

viewtopic.php?f=4&t=104629

Cheers, Lee.
